sqlMap.select: select distinct plan.* from zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_order_plan plan where carplan.cuid = carbom.car_plan_id and carbom.order_planbom_id = planbom.cuid and planbom.order_plan_id = plan.cuid and carplan.cuid = '$carPlanId$'

select cuid, psbh, aufnr, pcdat, pxdat, KDAUF, matnr, maktx1, psmng, pmenge, plant, arbpl,arbpl1, group_id, plan_type, percent, state, merge, freeze, notsetBomnum,
indexno, advance, zbz
from
( select cuid, psbh, aufnr, pcdat, pxdat, KDAUF, matnr, maktx1, psmng, pmenge, plant, arbpl, arbpl1, group_id, plan_type,percent,state, instr(groupName,',') merge,freeze,notsetBomnum,indexno, '0' as advance,zbz from ( select oup.psbh, op.cuid, od.aufnr, od.pcdat, od.KDAUF, od.matnr, od.maktx1, od.psmng, od.pmenge, op.plant, od.arbpl, od.arbpl1, gop.group_id, op.plan_type,op.percent,op.state,oup.label_cn as groupName,aide.px_date pxdat,nvl(od.freeze,0) freeze, 0 as notsetBomnum,oup.indexno,op.zbz from zg_t_order_plan op, zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order od, zg_t_order_plan_group oup, zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma
where aide.order_id=od.cuid and op.plant=aide.plant and op.cuid = gop.order_plan_id and op.order_id = od.cuid and gop.group_id=oup.cuid and op.state<>'9' and od.order_state<>'-1'
op.state<>'-1'
and ma.employee_id = '$operatorId$' and op.plant=ma.org_id
and op.plant is not null and op.plant='$plant$' ) m ) union
( select cuid, psbh, aufnr, pcdat, pxdat, KDAUF, matnr, maktx1, psmng, pmenge, plant, arbpl, arbpl1, group_id, plan_type,percent,state, instr(groupName,',') merge,freeze,notsetBomnum,indexno, '0' as advance,zbz from ( select oup.psbh, op.cuid, od.aufnr, od.pcdat, od.KDAUF, od.matnr, od.maktx1, od.psmng, od.pmenge, op.plant, od.arbpl, od.arbpl1, gop.group_id, op.plan_type,op.percent,op.state,oup.label_cn as groupName,aide.px_date pxdat,nvl(od.freeze,0) freeze, 0 as notsetBomnum,oup.indexno,op.zbz from zg_t_order_plan op, zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order od, zg_t_order_plan_group oup, zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma
where aide.order_id=od.cuid and op.plant=aide.plant and op.cuid = gop.order_plan_id and op.order_id = od.cuid and gop.group_id=oup.cuid and od.order_state<>'-1'
op.state<>'-1'
and ma.employee_id = '$operatorId$' and op.plant=ma.org_id
and op.plant is not null and op.plant='$plant$' ) m )
union
( select distinct cuid, psbh, aufnr, pcdat, pxdat, KDAUF, matnr, maktx1, psmng, pmenge, plant, arbpl, arbpl1, group_id, plan_type,percent,state, instr(groupName,',') merge,freeze,notsetBomnum, indexno, '1' as advance,zbz from ( select oup.psbh, op.cuid, od.aufnr, od.pcdat, od.KDAUF, od.matnr, od.maktx1, od.psmng, od.pmenge, op.plant, od.arbpl, od.arbpl1, gop.group_id, op.plan_type,op.percent,op.state,oup.label_cn as groupName,aide.px_date pxdat,nvl(od.freeze,0) freeze, 0 as notsetBomnum, oup.indexno,op.zbz from zg_t_order_plan op, zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order od, zg_t_order_plan_group oup, zg_t_order_aide aide, zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_bom bom, zg_materiel mat ,fw_organization_manager ma
where od.cuid=orderbom.order_id and planbom.order_bom_id=orderbom.cuid and planbom.order_plan_id=op.cuid and orderbom.idnrk=bom.idnrk and orderbom.matkl=bom.matkl and orderbom.lgort=bom.lgort and bom.matkl=mat.id and bom.lgort=mat.lgort and mat.advance='1' and planbom.state<>'9' and trunc(aide.px_date)>trunc(to_date('$pxDate$', 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and aide.order_id=od.cuid and op.plant=aide.plant and op.cuid = gop.order_plan_id and op.order_id = od.cuid and gop.group_id=oup.cuid and od.order_state<>'-1'
op.state<>'-1'
and ma.employee_id = '$operatorId$' and op.plant=ma.org_id
and op.plant is not null and op.plant='$plant$' ) m
)
ORDER BY arbpl,indexNo,pxdat, psbh

select cuid, psbh, aufnr, pcdat, pxdat, KDAUF, matnr, maktx1, psmng, pmenge, plant, arbpl, arbpl1, group_id, plan_type,percent,state, instr(groupName,',') merge,freeze,notsetBomnum,indexno, '0' as advance,zbz from ( select oup.psbh, op.cuid, od.aufnr, od.pcdat, od.KDAUF, od.matnr, od.maktx1, od.psmng, od.pmenge, op.plant, od.arbpl, od.arbpl1, gop.group_id, op.plan_type,op.percent,op.state,oup.label_cn as groupName,aide.px_date pxdat,nvl(od.freeze,0) freeze, 0 as notsetBomnum, indexno,op.zbz from zg_t_order_plan op, zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order od, zg_t_order_plan_group oup, zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma
where aide.order_id=od.cuid and op.plant=aide.plant and op.cuid = gop.order_plan_id and op.order_id = od.cuid and gop.group_id=oup.cuid and od.order_state<>'-1'
op.state<>'-1'
and ma.employee_id = '$operatorId$' and op.plant=ma.org_id
and op.plant is not null and op.plant='$plant$' ) m
ORDER BY arbpl,indexNo,pxdat, psbh
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ZG_T_ORDER_PLAN SET STATE = #state# WHERE CUID = #cuid#
UPDATE ZG_T_ORDER_PLAN SET STATE = #state#, plan_date=#planDate# WHERE CUID = #cuid#
sqlMap.delete: delete from zg_t_carplan t where t.cuid in (select temp.car_plan_id from zg_t_carbom temp where temp.order_planid=#cuid#)
delete from zg_t_carbom t where t.order_planid=#cuid#
sqlMap.select: select distinct pb.department_id, ob.lgort, pb.user_id from zg_t_order_planbom pb, zg_t_orderbom ob where pb.order_plan_id = #orderPlanId# and pb.order_bom_id = ob.cuid

select pb.state, pb.cuid as order_planbom_id, pb.order_bom_id, pb.order_id, nvl(pb.car_num, 0) - nvl(pb.plan_num, 0) num from zg_t_order_planbom pb, zg_t_orderbom ob where pb.order_plan_id = '$orderPlanId$' and pb.order_bom_id = ob.cuid and pb.department_id = '$deptId$' and ob.lgort = '$storageId$' and pb.user_id = '$userId$' and pb.state = '8' and nvl(pb.car_num, 0) - nvl(pb.plan_num, 0) != 0
sqlMap.update: insert into zg_t_carbom(cuid,car_plan_id,order_planbom_id,order_bom_id,order_id,plan_num,real_num) select sys_guid(),'$carPlanId$',order_planbom_id,order_bom_id,order_id,num,num from( select pb.state, pb.cuid as order_planbom_id, pb.order_bom_id, pb.order_id, nvl(pb.car_num, 0) - nvl(pb.plan_num, 0) num from zg_t_order_planbom pb, zg_t_orderbom ob where pb.order_plan_id = '$orderPlanId$' and pb.order_bom_id = ob.cuid and pb.department_id = '$deptId$' and ob.lgort = '$storageId$' and pb.user_id = '$userId$' and pb.state = '8' and nvl(pb.car_num, 0) - nvl(pb.plan_num, 0) != 0)

update zg_t_order_planbom pb set pb.plan_num=pb.car_num,pb.state='$state$' where exists (select 1 from zg_t_orderbom ob where pb.order_plan_id = '$orderPlanId$' and pb.order_bom_id = ob.cuid and pb.department_id = '$deptId$' and ob.lgort ='$storageId$' and pb.user_id = '$userId$' and pb.state = '8' and nvl(pb.car_num, 0) - nvl(pb.plan_num, 0) != 0)
update zg_t_order_planbom t set t.state='$state$' where t.order_plan_id= '$orderPlanId$' and (t.state!='9' or t.state is null)
sqlMap.select:
select count(distinct cuid) from ( ( select distinct t.cuid from zg_t_order_plan t,ZG_T_ORDER zto,zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma where zto.cuid=aide.order_id and t.plant=aide.plant and zto.cuid=t.order_id and zto.order_state<>'-1'
and t.state<>'9'
and t.plan_type=#type# and trunc(#pxDate#)>trunc(aide.px_date) and t.plant='$plant$'
and ma.employee_id='$operatorId$' and t.plant=ma.org_id
zto.arbpl='$arbpl$' ) union
( select distinct t.cuid from zg_t_order_plan t,ZG_T_ORDER zto,zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma where zto.cuid=aide.order_id and t.plant=aide.plant and zto.cuid=t.order_id and zto.order_state<>'-1' and t.plan_type=#type# and trunc(#pxDate#)=trunc(aide.px_date) and t.plant='$plant$'
and ma.employee_id='$operatorId$' and t.plant=ma.org_id
zto.arbpl='$arbpl$' ) union
( select distinct t.cuid from zg_t_order_plan t,ZG_T_ORDER zto,zg_t_order_aide aide, zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_bom bom, zg_materiel mat ,fw_organization_manager ma where zto.cuid=aide.order_id and t.plant=aide.plant and zto.cuid=t.order_id and orderbom.order_id=zto.cuid and orderbom.cuid=planbom.order_bom_id and planbom.order_plan_id=t.cuid and orderbom.idnrk=bom.idnrk and orderbom.matkl=bom.matkl and orderbom.lgort=bom.lgort and bom.matkl=mat.id and bom.lgort=mat.lgort and mat.advance = '1' and zto.order_state<>'-1' and planbom.state <> '9'
and t.plan_type=#type# and trunc(aide.px_date)>trunc(#pxDate#) and t.plant='$plant$'
and ma.employee_id='$operatorId$' and t.plant=ma.org_id
zto.arbpl='$arbpl$'
))

select count(distinct cuid) from (
( select distinct t.cuid from zg_t_order_plan t,ZG_T_ORDER zto,zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma where zto.cuid=aide.order_id and t.plant=aide.plant and zto.cuid=t.order_id and zto.order_state<>'-1' and t.plan_type=#type# and trunc(#pxDate#)=trunc(aide.px_date) and t.plant='$plant$'
and ma.employee_id='$operatorId$' and t.plant=ma.org_id
zto.arbpl='$arbpl$' ) )

select count(1) from zg_t_order_plan t,ZG_T_ORDER zto,zg_t_order_aide aide ,fw_organization_manager ma where zto.cuid=aide.order_id and t.plant=aide.plant and zto.cuid=t.order_id and zto.order_state<>'-1' and t.plan_type=#type# and trunc(#pxDate#)=trunc(aide.px_date) and t.plant='$plant$'
and ma.employee_id='$operatorId$' and t.plant=ma.org_id
zto.arbpl='$arbpl$'
and t.state='9'
select t.* from zg_t_order_plan t where t.order_id='$orderId$'
